ComicInfo.Summary: All combat, all the time! The Pagan organization known as "The Bright Hand" is planning to bring forth a new age on Earth-an age that will sweep aside civilization as we know it! Only Patience, the young and largely untrained Magdalena, has the power to stop them. But can she prevail when there's a traitor in her midst?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 21:47:05. [CVDB122544]

ComicInfo.Letterer: Dreamer Design, Robin Spehar, Dennis Heisler, Mark Roslan
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Eric Basaldua, Matt BATT Banning, Beth Sotelo, Matt Banning
ComicInfo.Editor: Jim McLauchlin, Peter Lam, Phil Smith, Renae Geerlings, Scott Tucker, Philip W. Smith II
